LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Net
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, net of reinsurance recoverables, as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Incurred Benefits (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred during the period presented, resulting in an increase to the liability for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Incurred Benefits
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Other Liability Adjustments
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Net amount of other increases or decreases to the liability for guaranteed minimum benefits on long-duration contracts occurring during the period.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Payment for Benefits
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholders and contract holders for guaranteed minimum benefit payments.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Reinsurance Recoverable
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.label: Liabilities of Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.description: Liability (such as a mortgage) related to a disposal group that is held for sale and anticipated to be sold in less than one year. The liability is expected to be discharged as part of the plan of sale for the asset.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, before Reinsurance
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of present value of future benefit to be paid to or on behalf of policyholder and related expense less present value of future net premium receivable under insurance contract.

LifeInsuranceInForceAssumed.label: Life Insurance in Force, Assumed
LifeInsuranceInForceAssumed.description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding assumed from other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

LifeInsuranceInForceCeded.label: Life Insurance in Force, Ceded
LifeInsuranceInForceCeded.description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding ceded to other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

LifeInsuranceInForceGross.label: Life Insurance in Force, Gross
LifeInsuranceInForceGross.description: Amount before contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

LifeInsuranceInForceNet.label: Life Insurance in Force, Net
LifeInsuranceInForceNet.description: Amount after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

LifeInsuranceInForcePercentageAssumedToN.label: Life Insurance in Force, Percentage Assumed to Net
LifeInsuranceInForcePercentageAssumedToN.description: Percentage of assumed life insurance issued and outstanding contracts to life insurance issued and outstanding after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

LoansInsurancePolicy.label: Loans, Gross, Insurance Policy
LoansInsurancePolicy.description: Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

MarginDepositAssets.label: Margin Deposit Assets
MarginDepositAssets.description: The amount of cash or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivatives securities position which was partially obtained with funds provided by the broker dealer.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Carrying Amount of Mortgages (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.description: The carrying amount of the outstanding balance due under the mortgage loan.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Adoption, Quantification (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Represents the quantification of the effect of adopting the new accounting standard or change in accounting principle expected by the entity to have a significant effect on the entity's financial statements.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

ObligationToReturnSecuritiesReceivedAsCo.label: Obligation to Return Securities Received as Collateral
ObligationToReturnSecuritiesReceivedAsCo.description: The fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset that appears on the balance sheet called Securities Received as Collateral.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSale.description: Gross appreciation or the gross loss in value of the total unsold securities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Adjustment that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency of the reporting entity, net of tax.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Securities Sold
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PolicyChargesInsurance.label: Policy Charges, Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PolicyChargesInsurance.description: An amount that an insurer adds to a policy's premium, or deducts from a policy's cash value or contract holder's account, as compensation for services rendered; may include fees.

PolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Policyholder Contract Deposit
PolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

PolicyholderFunds.label: Policyholder Account Balance
PolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.label: SEC Schedule, 12-17, Insurance Companies, Reinsurance, Premium, Percentage Assumed to Net
PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.description: Percentage of assumed premium earned to premium earned after effects of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits asset (also known as value of business acquired).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: The amount of the present value of future profits asset that was amortized during the period, generally in proportion to related revenue earned, estimated gross profits, or over the customer relationship or some other period.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Other Investments
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity (principal being due), prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Assumed from Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums assumed from other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Ceded to Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums ceded to other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Gross Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Net Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Net amount of gross premiums, less premiums ceded to other companies, plus premiums assumed from other companies; which represents the net amount of premium revenue on the income statement.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Percentage of Amount Assumed to Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Percentage of amount of premiums assumed from other companies to net amount of premiums.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Amount Retained
ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.description: Stated amount that is the upper retention limit per entity policy.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.label: Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnearnedPremiums.label: Unearned Premiums
UnearnedPremiums.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives, Net, before Tax
UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.label: Unrealized Loss on Foreign Currency Derivatives, before Tax
UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.description: Amount of unrealized loss recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income pertaining to the decrease in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments to the extent that a cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of statutory penalties accrued for a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed by the entity, in its tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
